for_sales.sales_text: Complete with trailer/trolley. The current owner has only had her out on the water 6 times in 6 years and she deserves to have more use.

boat.full_description:
Built by Andy Skentelbery as a tender for his schooner. Her current owner purchased her  in 2016, and added custom length oars and a custom trailer/ trolly combination. Rows beautifully.

She has a galvanised custom trailer/trolly.
boat.name: Gimlet
boat.short_description: A clinker ply rowing dinghy designed by Iain Oughtred.  Two rowing positions and a passenger seat.
